SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.spro.models

Klasse SystemDirector

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.spro.models.SystemDirector
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IsObservable
public class SystemDirector extends Object implements IsObservable
The SystemDirector class acts as the central coordinator for the application's various components. It facilitates communication between controllers and views and contains the main logic of the application. This class implements the IsObservable interface to enable notification of the view upon state changes.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • SystemDirector

      public SystemDirector()
      Constructor for the SystemDirector class. Initializes various controllers and generators, and loads initial data necessary for the application's operation.

  • Methodendetails

    • addEmployee

      public void addEmployee(byte[] avatar, String firstName, String lastName, String street, String city, String ahv, List<String> qualifications, List<String> selectedAbsenceDates)
      Adds a new employee to the system with specified details.
      Parameter:
      avatar - Array of bytes representing the avatar image of the employee.
      firstName - The first name of the employee.
      lastName - The last name of the employee.
      street - The street address of the employee.
      city - The city where the employee resides.
      ahv - The AHV (Swiss social security) number of the employee.
      qualifications - List of qualification names for the employee.
      selectedAbsenceDates - List of dates representing the employee's absences.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if provided data is invalid.

    • editAbsenceAndQualificationsOfEmployee

      public void editAbsenceAndQualificationsOfEmployee(Employee employee, List<String> selectedAbsenceDates, List<String> qualifications)
      This method allows for the modification of an employee's absences and qualifications. It updates the employee's qualifications based on the provided qualification names and associates the selected absence dates with the employee.
      Parameter:
      employee - The employee to be edited.
      selectedAbsenceDates - List of selected absence dates to be associated with the employee.
      qualifications - List of qualification names to be assigned to the employee.

      public List<LocalDate> getDatesOfNextMonth()
      Generates and returns a list of shifts for the next month.
      Gibt zurück:
      List of LocalDate objects representing the dates of the next month's shifts.

    • searchEmployeeByName

      public List<Employee> searchEmployeeByName(String name)
      Searches for employees by name.
      Parameter:
      name - The name or part of the name to search for.
      Gibt zurück:
      List of Employee objects that match the search criteria.

    • searchEmployeeByQualifications

      public void searchEmployeeByQualifications(List<String> qualificationName)
      Searches for employees by their qualifications.
      Parameter:
      qualificationName - List of qualification names to search for.

    • exportPDF

      public List<String> exportPDF()
      Exports a PDF document containing the scheduled shifts.
      Gibt zurück:
      List of Strings representing PDF content.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error in creating the PDF.

    • generateShiftPlan

      public List<Shift> generateShiftPlan() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Generates a shift plan for the upcoming period.
      Gibt zurück:
      List of Shift objects representing the generated shift plan.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an issue in generating the shift plan.

    • addShift

      public void addShift(LocalDate date, String time, String shiftTypeId)

      Parameter:
      date - The date of the shift.
      time - The time of the shift.
      shiftTypeId - The type ID of the shift.
